summary: This mods fixes the unproper transformation back to normal after the race has been changed via showracemenu. This occurs as a wrong headmorph.
descriptionHtml:
My mod from the Steam Workshop

Problem:
Should you ever think about changing your race via the console the werewolf tranformation back to human maybe will be broken.
This occurs because you will always tranform back into your very first race (at the Companions quest) and not your current one.
Your head will be a mess!

Solution:
This mod simply contains an altered script which saves the current race directly before the transformation to a werewolf, every time.

This fix is not contained in the Unofficial Skyrim Patch because it does not cover up cheats (showracemenu).

Imcompabilities:
Anything which alters the PlayerWerewolfChangeScript will be broken by this mod! I believe many werewolf mods out there will have that script changed.

Content:
One ESP and one BSA. The BSA holds the script.
Nothing else will be edited!
author: B01scout
